description: This file defines a Redux slice named 'ui' using Redux Toolkit, managing UI-related state such as sidebar, theme, loading states, modals, notifications, breadcrumbs, page title, filters, and errors. It includes initial state setup, reducers to modify state, and exports of actions and reducer.

methods.name: toggleSidebar
methods.description: Toggles the sidebar collapsed state and updates local storage.

methods.name: setSidebarCollapsed
methods.description: Sets the sidebar collapsed state explicitly and updates local storage.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.description: Sets the UI theme ('light' or 'dark') and updates local storage.

methods.name: setComponentLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state for a specific component.

methods.name: openModal
methods.description: Opens a modal with optional data.

methods.name: setPageTitle
methods.description: Sets the page title and updates document title.

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Sets a filter key to a specific value.

methods.name: setError
methods.description: Sets an error message for a specific key.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears the error message for a specific key.
